Description:
HIGH AND MIGHTY
Enjoy the heights of classy family living in this elevated contemporary home boasting commanding views across Geelong and the Surf Coast.
Light-filled and spacious on a 905sqm (approx.) corner block, the double-storey brick home is readymade for entertaining in style.
And with two distinct zones on two levels, its ideal for a growing family to spread out and find their own space.
Youll never tire of stunning views as far as the eye can see from the upstairs family living, dining and kitchen zone that boasts a wall of windows and spills out onto an alfresco deck.
With the high-end kitchen overlooking the living and entertaining spaces, the chef will always be at the centre of activity.
The kitchen features quality appliances, stone benchtops, island bench with breakfast bar, tiled splashback and loads of storage options.
The upper level is also home to a large separate lounge room, study, powder room and master bedroom with ensuite and walk-in robe that enjoys its own wing plus those scenic views.
Teenagers or guests will welcome the privacy of the lower level, with three bedrooms with built-in robes, central rumpus room, family bathroom and laundry.
Step out to a timber deck overlooking an enclosed lawn area ideal for kids to play safely.
Other highlights include a double garage, 2 street frontages both with driveways to park additional vehicles perfect for the Caravan, Boat and Trailer - under-house storage, ducted heating, split-system units and low-maintenance gardens.
The property is close to top schools including Belmont High, Highton Primary, Clairvaux Catholic School and Christian College.
Its also within easy reach of shopping in Waurn Ponds and Highton, Waurn Ponds train station, the Ring Road, Deakin University, Epworth hospital and Leisurelink pool.
And come summer, youre on the doorstep of the Surf Coast and Great Ocean Road.
Insights: 78-80 Grosvenor Drive, Wandana Heights VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Wandana Heights have recently been sold.

Description:
Easy living in a coveted location
Youll love:
The prime position of this modern & architecturally-designed home, located within a stones throw of Jan Jucs cliff-top walking trails, Reserve, surf breaks & shops.
All the quality custom features throughout including high ceilings, solid hardwood floors, plus light-filled open plan living spaces that have a great connection to the outdoors.
The ground floors well-appointed kitchen with its beautiful stone island bench is a dream come true for when it comes to entertaining family & friends.
Plus:
A Japanese-inspired garden courtyard offers peace & tranquility at the rear with a 2nd huge outdoor entertaining deck also located on the ground floor & a private sun deck upstairs too.
Downstairs also features: a master bedroom with ensuite, WIRs & a garden outlook, plus a European laundry, powder room, internal garage access & loads of storage throughout.
Upstairs comprises of two spacious bedrooms with BIRs, a 2nd living area with expansive treetop views, plus a large bathroom with a shower and spa bath.
Set in a quiet, safe & friendly pocket of Jan Juc this property is primed for buyers who are interested in a quality & low-maintenance coastal lifestyle.
Insights: 1 Riviera Drive, Jan Juc VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Jan Juc have recently been sold.

Description:
SOLD BEFORE ADVERTISING
Showcasing beautifully-presented interiors, superb entertaining options, and a north-facing backyard, this home takes fine family living to a whole new level!
Nestled in a peaceful pocket of the Bellrise Park Estate, this family-friendly neighbourhood will leave you wanting nothing. The local playground and sporting grounds are only a short stroll from the front door, meaning you wont have to venture far for some outdoor fun. Public transport is also within walking distance, while families will appreciate easy access to Leopold P.S. and the Leopold Community Hub. Enjoy living moments from the Gateway Plaza, Gateway Sanctuary and Lake Connewarre.
High ceilings grace the interiors, while the wide entrance creates a lovely sense of openness from the moment you step inside. The spacious open plan living/dining/kitchen zone unites with the alfresco deck via glass stacker doors creating an indoor-outdoor flow that is perfect for entertaining! Whether you want to relax under the shade or soak up the sunshine, the north-facing deck creates a beautiful outdoor setting while flowing onto the secure backyard. The kitchen seamlessly blends style and functionality with stone waterfall benchtops, large walk-in pantry, and ILVE stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, microwave and 900mm oven, gas cooktop, rangehood). Pendant lights make a stylish statement above both the breakfast bar and dining area. The lounge creates a light-filled retreat at the rear of the home, while the study will delight students and home business owners alike.
Overlooking the front garden, the Master Bedroom creates a calming oasis for busy parents. The dressing area and walk-in robe are wonderfully generous, while the en suite features a large shower, dual vanity and separate toilet. Three additional bedrooms with mirrored built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with the main bathroom and separate toilet. Floor-to-ceiling tiling and stone benchtops grace both bathrooms, while the laundry is complete with external access. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling keep you in the utmost comfort. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access.
Treat your family to the lifestyle youve been dreaming of in Leopold! Inspection will impress!
Insights: 5 Tidal Street, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Bursting with light & appeal
For sale by Openn Negotiation (flexible conditions online auction). The Openn Negotiation is under way and the property can sell at any time. Contact Olivia immediately to become qualified and avoid disappointment.
https://www.openn.com.au/app/properties/view/bt2shibbdfvg17114pq0?negotiationId=bt2shijbdfvg17114prg
Youll love:
This bright 2-bedroom unit thats one of only two & located at the rear of the block features a vaulted ceiling with freshly painted interiors, new timber look floors & new carpets throughout.
The spacious & inviting open plan kitchen/living area with its large north facing windows on one side, plus sliding doors on the other that lead into a large, private & fully fenced backyard.
A clever layout that sees both generously sized bedrooms spaced apart for increased privacy, with the master sharing access to a bathroom with shower & separate bathtub too.
Plus:
The neat & tidy kitchen has loads of bench & storage space, plus a large pantry cupboard.
Other features include built-in robes in both bedrooms, split system heating & cooling in the main living area, a 2nd toilet located in the laundry, plus the large double lock-up garage.
A cracking spot with Whites Beach located just a short 500m stroll away at the end of the street plus easy access to all of Torquays shops, schools, recreational spaces & more.
This wonderful, low maintenance home is an ideal set up for anyone thats looking to move straight in or take advantage of Torquays strong property rental market.

Description:
Move Straight In!
Private Inspections Welcome - By Appointment Only
This property offers a solid low maintenance home in a handy location and a great opportunity to invest in your future. Making the most of its northerly aspect, the home features a sunny open plan living, meals and kitchen area. This space is light filled and includes a galley style kitchen with stainless appliances and a breakfast bar. There is effortless flow out to a hardwood deck for outdoor entertaining. A second living area provides a quiet break out space, or the ideal media zone.
There are four generously sized bedrooms, all with ample built in storage. The master bedroom includes a walk in robe and en-suite; while the family sized bathroom has a separate bath and shower. A functional laundry with linen press and the double lock up garage with internal access entry complete the floor plan.
Outdoors is all about creating a laid back lifestyle. The 482m² (approx) grounds are super easy care with no lawns to mow, guaranteeing more time for relaxing and making the most of the nearby beach and Spring Creek Reserve. Shops, schools, cafes and essential amenities are all conveniently close by too.
Anyone who appreciates single level, spacious and sunny living will grab this chance to enjoy the Surf Coast life in an established and quiet corner of Torquay.
Note: Photo id with current address must be provided at all open for inspections due to Covid 19 restrictions.
Insights: 124 Beach Road, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
LARGE FAMILY COASTAL HOME IN A GREAT LOCATION!!
This impressive 4-bedroom family home offers a functional floorplan & contemporary design aesthetic that will appeal to the most astute buyers. Showcased over two levels, Downstairs comprises 3 bedrooms with built in robes, family bathroom, separate laundry with built in cabinetry, second living room inclusive of kitchenette flowing through to private rear gardens and undercover alfresco area, perfect for entertaining all year round. The upper level complete with hardwood polished floorboards, provides an impressive open plan living featuring an entertainer's kitchen complete with stone bench tops, a 900mm cooktop and a walk-in pantry. adjoining dining area and lounge room that opens to a decked undercover with beautiful ocean views. The private and spacious, master bedroom retreat boasts a sizable walk in robe, en-suite with twin vanity and north facing balcony. The home offers many more features including a double lock up garage with storeroom, plantation shutters, alarm system, and ducted heating and cooling. All sited on a generous 476m2 (approx.) all within walking distance to the Dunes Shopping Village, Medical centre, and Surf Coast Secondary College, Do not miss out as this beautiful home is sure to provide the everyday modern family with effortless living. Enquire today!!
Insights: 27 Inshore Drive, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2008 and 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
SCENIC PARK THE PERFECT LIFESTYLE WITH SPACE & PRIVACY!!
Scenic Park is positioned on a picturesque 110.67 (44.79Ha) acres in the ever popular and tightly held Bellbrae area. This large family home is very private and extremely spacious, ensuring the astute purchaser a relaxed and enjoyable rural lifestyle of the grandest proportions.
The homestead styled residence comprises open plan living spaces capturing rural views over the beautiful manicured gardens. Offering 5 large bedrooms (master bedroom with en-suite and WIR), separate study, a contemporary kitchen featuring stone bench tops with quality appliances, separate dining area, spacious lounge room with open fire place, 2nd living, and additional rumpus/billiard room at the rear allowing family members to play and appreciate their own space.
Other internal features include: Enclosed sunroom/entertaining area opening onto the in-ground solar heated swimming pool, high ceilings, reverse cycle heating and cooling, family bathroom, large laundry, wine room/storeroom and double garage. External features include tennis court, an excellent storage shed with tack room, old shearing shed with power, 4 dams, 16 paddocks all with water troughs (pressurized water) and secure fencing, hayshed, cattle yards with loading race and crush (ideal for those looking to run some livestock or horses), a fantastic horse arena (60m x 30m), horse stables, round yard, sealed road frontage and with the luxury of the school bus driving past the front gate to all the major schools in Geelong.
This truly is a great opportunity to purchase an exclusive and unique property that you can just move in, relax and enjoy the perfect rural lifestyle that you so richly deserve, as properties like these are rarely found. Located only approx. 10mins to Torquay and Anglesea and 20mins to Geelong. Call us today for more information and to arrange your private inspection.
Insights: First listed on 14 October, this house has been on Domain for 6 days (last updated on 14 October). It was last sold in 2007 and 1 other 5 bedroom house in Bellbrae have recently been sold.

Description:
Your Dreams Can Start Here!!
Situated in the ever-popular location in the Highview Estate, this titled and ready to build 518m2 block provides many building options for the astute buyer. Being at the highest point of the Estate, this block has a fantastic building envelope with minimal sloping and amazing views of the Barrabool Hills and is surrounded by world-class architecturally designed homes.
Conveniently located only moments away from the Barrabool Hills Plaza with gymnasium, pharmacy, Woolworths and plenty of more shopping to make your life easy, not forgetting the warm community vibe of Highton Village with excellent cafes and eateries to enjoy over the weekend. A selection of quality schools available, plus excellent sporting reserves, recreational parks and the ever-popular Barwon River Precinct. This will also create easy access to the Geelong Ring Road that will take you to Melbourne within 45 minutes, or cruise down to the world-famous surf coast without hassle.
Insights: 4-6 Narrawong Avenue, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
A fantastic home with loads of potential
Youll love:
This classic weatherboard home sits on a level 585m2 allotment that faces north and is in the heart of Jan Juc walking distance to the local park, shops & beach!
The many appealing features throughout, like spacious light-filled interiors, high cathedral ceilings, polished timber floors & more.
A modern & impressive kitchen is the homes centrepiece, encompassing a 900mm oven & cooktop, subway tile splash back & a large Caesarstone island bench.
The spacious 2nd living area attached at the rear with its sliding doors leading out to a grassy backyard & separate undercover alfresco deck.
Plus:
The master bedroom with its own entry into a large, two-way bathroom with a bath & separate shower.
The main open plan living area is huge & features a central wood heater while ceiling fans & a split-system unit at either end of the home provide additional heating & cooling.
Other features include the homes partial wrap around verandah & beautiful, sun-drenched front yard, plus theres also a large garage and large workshop on site.

Description:
Outstanding 5-bedroom home with stunning ocean views
Youll love:
The space, privacy & quality craftsmanship offered throughout this large 5-bedroom home, featuring 3 living areas, 3 bathrooms, plus a big backyard with soft lawn.
Breathtaking ocean views that stretch all the way to Port Philip Heads & beyond from the entire 2nd level with waves breaking at Jan Juc beach also clearly visible.
A luxurious parents retreat with ensuite & WIR, plus a lounge/study & balcony thats above 2 of the bedrooms, with 2 more spacious bedrooms located in the recent addition at the rear of the home.
The superb kitchen with all the bells & whistles is located at the homes heart and opens onto a large decked area that overlooks the private backyard the ideal set up for entertaining family & friends!
Plus:
Other quality features include high ceilings throughout, polished solid hardwood floors, plantation shutters on all front windows, plus a multitude of timber accents, stone bench tops, storage & more.
Youll also enjoy having zoned reverse cycle heating & cooling throughout, plus 2 hot water units, a new outdoor BBQ area with a bar fridge, and the BOSE sound system in the main living room.
The home is clad with quality Scyon Linea weatherboards with its exterior and most of the interiors having been freshly painted for a durable & long-lasting finish.
Theres space for 4 cars on the sealed forecourt, plus 2 more in a double garage that has 2 new roller doors plus a large workshop at the rear and the list goes on.
Insights: 37 Great Ocean Road, Jan Juc VIC 3228 was last sold in 1999 and 4 other 5 bedroom house in Jan Juc have recently been sold.

Description:
Contemporary, low maintenance living.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Cam Foster on 0406 597 050.
Perfectly positioned in the heart of Marshall and just over three years old, you will enjoy being only a stone's throw from Marshall Station and with easy access to the Geelong Ring Road it's perfect for that commute to Melbourne or weekends down the coast. Suited to those looking to enter the market or investors alike, this neat and tidy Porter Davis home is ready for you to move straight in with absolute ease.
Offering three bedrooms the master with ensuite and walk in robe while the other two bedrooms both with build in robes and are serviced by the central bathroom and separate toilet. The central kitchen offers stainless steel oven with gas cooktop, stone bench tops and ample cupboard space. With a glass sliding door opening from the kitchen/dining/living area, you will embrace the outdoor alfresco area and yard, soaking up all the north facing sun. Key features include ducted heating, split in kitchen/living area and remote double lock up garage with internal access.
Certain to impress first home buyers being under five years old, plus investors or downsizers alike. This is definitely one to inspect.

Description:
A Beach House is Not Just for Christmas
A true lifestyle offering, with a suburban slant complemented by the convenience of Old Torquay's offerings.
Delivered by a highly respected developer we bring you Townhouse 2 in this exciting new townhouse development situated right in the heart of Old Torquay.
What YOU'LL LOVE:
- Leave the car in the garage and walk everywhere
- Joinery integrated fridge built-in robes
- Heating and cooling throughout
- Blackbutt hardwood timber floors & quality carpets
- TV antenna and NBN ready
- Slimline auto garage door + second car park undercover
- Feature powder coated fencing
- Fully Landscaped and wall gardens
- Double glazing to all windows
- Guaranteed rental returns
- Holiday rental opportunity
Livability and convenience combine with classy high-end finishes and each townhouse is masterfully designed to deliver an effortless elegance. Enjoy sensational livability year-round with cleverly connected indoor and outdoor living spaces that allow you to enjoy all seasons in absolute comfort.

Description:
A solid choice for quality lifestyle
Youll love:
This solid & spacious multi-level home with expansive views of the ocean & across Spring Creek is situated in an unbeatable position within the increasingly popular Church Estate.
Enjoying the sunset from the upstairs deck that also connects to a wonderful open plan kitchen, meals & living area and includes a cosy gas fireplace.
The ground floors master bedroom retreat, featuring an ensuite with double vanities & a large WIR, plus access to its own private courtyard and outdoor spa!
The 2nd living area & large workshop on the lower level: both of which overlook the landscaped backyard that includes an undercover alfresco area too.
Plus:
The backyard also features a beautiful open pergola and several fruiting trees including citrus, plum, olive, apple, pear & apricot varieties.
Other features include two additional bedrooms with BIRs, a large study with built-in cabinetry plus lets not forget theres a fantastic wine cellar!
Youll also enjoy double glazing throughout: 5kw of solar panels on the roof, multiple split systems, gas fireplaces and electric panel heaters adding to the heating & cooling options too.
Located within easy walking distance to Torquays town centre, surf beach, Bell St shops & offering so much more this is ONE quality lifestyle opportunity thats tough to beat.
Insights: 17 Rocklea Drive, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2009 and 126 other 3 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Meticulous, Modern & Contemporary!
Neat as a pin, this modern and contemporary solid brick townhouse is perfect for first home buyers, small families and investors alike! From its impressive façade to its light-filled interior with an appealing neutral decor the home is a simple, yet sheer delight.
Offering comfort and functionality, there are three spacious bedrooms, each with the convenience of built in robes. The master is nicely complimented by a main bathroom and an additional second, separate toilet.
The gorgeous kitchen overlooks the open plan living and dining, becoming central to the heart of the home. The kitchen features a built-in oven, gas cook top, dishwasher and well-appointed storage.
The kitchen/dining offers gorgeous views to the quaint, alfresco entertaining area, with superbly manicured courtyard garden through the glass sliding doors. An ideal space to retreat outdoors.
Other thoughtfully considered features include; carpet and tiles throughout, ducted heating, split system A/C, double remote garage with internal access and European laundry.
Positioned on its own title this townhouse presents an exceptional opportunity to reside in an ideal, family friendly neighbourhood. Located just minutes walk to the Waurn Ponds Train Station & nearby Shopping Centre, the home is most conveniently situated. With Leisurelink Aquatic & Recreation Centre, Deakin University, Epworth Private Hospital and locals schools close by, it is a highly sought after location. The abundance of amenities is further enhanced by easy access to the Geelong Ring Road allowing for a seem-less commute to Melbourne or the Surf Coast.
With its meticulous presentation, quality and convenience, this home is sure to impress!
Insights: 48 Oakwood Crescent, Waurn Ponds VIC 3216 was last sold in 2011 and 19 other 3 bedroom house in Waurn Ponds have recently been sold.

Description:
Much Loved Triple Fronted Brick in Prime Location!
Set on a terrific 644sqm (approx.) block, this much loved family home is presented to the market for the very first time and represents an amazing opportunity to purchase at entry level in the increasingly trendy surburb, with substantial potential to further improve this propertys value through update, renovation or development (STCA).
Located in a quiet and private setting amongst established trees and tranquil north-facing front garden, this hidden gem boasts many of the most appealing characteristics of its era with a north facing patio, triple street frontage and original floorplan. The elevated position of this house enjoys expansive views of Highton. Whilst the property would benefit from an update, the charm and homely ambience of this house is still intact and awaiting its next chapter.
Consisting of three bedrooms plus utility rooms/home office/study option, the north facing master bedroom, spacious lounge and dining area all benefit from the abundance of natural light. The kitchen adjoining the dining is neat and presentable and lends to updating and possible expanding into the existing laundry behind. The mid century fireplace has retained its original charm whilst been updated with a gas log heater. A reverse cycle A/C in the dining area also ensures the living areas remain comfortable all year round.
Outdoors, there is a single lockup garage and plenty of off street parking. There is a second roller door at the rear of the garage that opens onto a concrete space perfect for storing a caravan or trailer. The terraced garden of this private backyard offers ample space for play or further extension of the home (STCA).
If you are looking to take your first steps into the property market, to invest or to find the perfect site to create your own dream home, this is an extraordinary opportunity from any angle.
Insights: 2 Violet Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 182 other 3 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Low maintenance in leafy blue chip location!
This updated unit is located in one of Hightons best locations a leafy pocket just a stroll to the Barwon River and minutes to Highton Village with its local amenities and café lifestyle. Refurbished in the past few years to provide more than comfortable accommodation to make this a hassle free investment or the perfect unit to move in and enjoy or enhance and add to as you see fit!
The internal fitout is modern, yet neutral throughout offering open plan loungeroom, functional kitchen with meals area and two good sized bedrooms (one with built in robe).
The bathroom includes laundry facilities and a separate toilet.
Outdoor offers ample car accommodation including secure carport with roller door and extra car space. Also includes low maintenance outdoor courtyard with garden shed.
Potential rental return of $300 per week.
Unrivalled location, a terrific first home, downsizer option or brilliant investment opportunity!

Description:
A beautiful, north facing elevation on 761m2!
*Current bid $1,100,000* For sale by Openn Negotiation (flexible conditions online auction). The Openn Negotiation is under way and the property can sell at any time. Contact Shaun immediately to become qualified and avoid disappointment. Open to all buyers.
Youll love:
· The location of this solid home with its superb elevated position which looks out across a huge front yard and Jan Juc to the north, a most desirable orientation.
· The simple & functional floorplan thats full of natural light, featuring 3 bedrooms with two living areas and a leafy outlook at every turn.
· Being situated on one of Jan Jucs most appealing streets. Only a row back from the cliffs its an easy walk to the beach, walking trails, parks and Jan Juc Village at the end of the street.
· The property is surround by established native trees giving the property a brilliant coastal bush surrounding. This quiet street has minimal through traffic.
Plus:
· This very cool beach abode has been freshly painted throughout, re-tiled and includes a new roof & lots of scope to expand into your dream lifestyle home!
· Theres also split system heating & cooling in the main living room, a wall heater in the dining room, a single carport & a fully landscaped front-yard to enjoy.
· Words alone dont do this incredible opportunity in Jan Juc enough justice it simply has to be seen & felt to be fully appreciated.

Description:
An ideal first home, investment or downsizer - Neat as a pin!
** PLEASE CONTACT AGENT FOR A PRIVATE INSPECTION **
What a fantastic opportunity to get into the housing market. This 3bedroom brick veneer home positioned on 328sqms* with separate title, 12 solar panels, remote garage is the perfect start for any first home buyer, the astute investor or as an ideal home to the downsize too. Located in a quiet & established court with public transport, local schools & Leopold Plaza just minutes away. The Floorplan highlights a spacious & light filled open plan lounge, dining & kitchen area with sliding door access to the outdoor alfresco entertaining & private rear yard. The Master bedroom includes a WIR & En-suite with heated towel rails & digital controlled hot water system. Further-more, the additional bedrooms are complete with BIRs & serviced by the central bathroom & separate toilet.
The home is temperature controlled by a large split system A/C unit in the lounge with an additional gas space heater located in the open plan dining & kitchen creating all year- round comfort.
A superbly presented home with low maintenance gardens all in within close proximity to Geelongs CBD, Bellarine Peninsula & Ocean Grove.
We look forward to welcoming you home.

Description:
Be The Envy Of Your Friends & Entertain In Style
Stand out from the rest with this stunning home with an entertaining area sure to WOW your friends and family.
This meticulously crafted home on a low maintenance block represents style, quality and exceptional finishes. Comprising a separate formal lounge with space for a study nook, a spacious informal lounge incorporates a meals area overseen by a quality kitchen with S/S appliances, WIP & ample bench space.
The master suite features WIR with built in cabinetry, ensuite and private access out to the entertaining area. A further 2 robed bedrooms are serviced by a main family bathroom.
Fall in love with the outdoor area, stunning and unique, north facing, this expansive decked entertaining area seamlessly integrates from the main living area. The one of a kind alfresco has been fastidiously built, catering for year round entertaining. Featuring a built-in BBQ, built-in bar accentuated with a stone feature wall and timber cladding, planter boxes, heavy duty outdoor speakers, T.V outlet & industrial style outdoor cafe blinds.
Packed full of surprises this home features a remote DLUG with internal access, gas ducted heating, 2 x split systems and a garden shed.
Situated within 15 mins to the World famous Surf Coast, less than 10 mins to the CBD, in close proximity to Marshall Train Station, IGA supermarket & local schools and much more.
The low maintenance manicured gardens will allow you to free up your spare time so you can focus on more important things like relaxing and entertaining with friends.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
LOW MAINTENANCE COASTAL LIVING!!
Be impressed by this spacious two-level townhouse located in the popular Wombah Park Estate, built for low maintenance, lifestyle and in a great location the property comprises 3 bedrooms with built in robes, large scale family bathroom and spacious upstairs master bedroom featuring a private balcony, large walk in robe and en-suite.
The bright family sized living space incorporating the tremendous kitchen on the upper level is sure to impress the fussiest of chef's, combining granite bench tops, extensive built in cabinetry, quality Ilve and Bosch s/s appliances and boasts ocean glimpses through the expansive windows and entertaining balcony. Access to the private and peaceful rear yard is through the well-equipped laundry as well as a rear roller door in the double lock up garage, the residence features high ceilings, timber floorboards, infinity gas hot water, split system heating and cooling, ducted vacuum, stairwell skylight, alarm system and water tank, situated on a low maintenance 384m2(approx.) allotment. Within a hop, skip and jump to the beach, shops, reserves and town centre, this is the Ideal property for those wishing to downsize, secure an excellent lifestyle or investment property, low maintenance coastal living has never looked so good! Call us today!!
